sentences.english: Pinocchio didn't want to miss school, but he went with the boys.
sentences.chinese: 皮諾奇並不想翹課，但他還是跟着這些男孩一起去了。

sentences.english: Skip the lecture, download the podcast.
Skipping class to tour around Europe is a “good” reason.
sentences.chinese: 翹課去歐洲旅遊是一個“不錯”的理由。

sentences.english: Because all my friends who never got caught are not doing too well today.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我那些翹課卻沒被逮着的朋友們現在都混得不好。
